conbody.p: There is only one public API: setABRParameters()

To return the parameters required for MBR processing, you need to implement the following functions from IPlaybackConfig:
getABRInitialBitRate()
Returns an integer value that represents the byte-per-second profile.
getABRMinBitRate()
Returns an integer value that represents the byte-per-second profile.
getABRMaxBitRate()
Returns an integer value that represents the byte-per-second profile.
getABRPolicy()
Returns the ABRPolicy enum: ABR_AGGRESSIVE, ABR_CONSERVATIVE and ABR_MODERATE .
